title: Comp Meth for Simul & ML
description: Introduction to numerical methods which are fundamental in modeling, simulation, and machine learning.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2605 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and MATH 3406 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
